page.title: 12Bee Keeping (cont)
page.content: He takes the{honey}from the hive and puts them in a metal honey extractor which looks a bit like a metal dustbin. He turns this by hand and the honey spins out (centrifugal force). A tap at the bottom of the extractor lets out the honey. When Mr Reed wants to change the honey trays he puts on a special white suit with a net face cover. He uses bellows which gives out smoke to keep the bees away. Mr Reed has to protect his hives from{mice, wax eating moths, birds}and {ants. Bradninch}has plenty of wild life.
